simplesect.para: USB host mode interrupt status. Bit field USB0_BASE->GINTSTS_HOSTMODE

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Provides USB host global interrupt status. This value can be used to provide interrupt status to the IRQ handler function XMC_USBH_HandleIrq().

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Updates logical state of the USB host driver based on the input status value. It handles port interrupt and channel interrupt. It responsible for updating data toggle information for multi-packet data transmission. It executes the callback function on transfer completion and reception of data. It also does error management and calls the relevant callback functions to indicate it to the application.
uint8_t Value has no significance for the low level driver.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Function implements time delay logic. The USB host low level driver provides a weak definition for delay which has to re-implemented with time delay logic. The low level driver expects blocking implementation of the delay.

parameterdescription.para: Address of the port which has the pin used to enable VBUS charge pump.
Pin number in the port selected in previous argument using which the VBUS charge pump has to be enabled.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Configures the port pin with alternate output function 1. VBUS enabling pins work with alternate output function 1. Note:The input port pin should support USB VBUS as an alternate function. Typical ports that support VBUS enable are: P3_2 and P0_1.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: De-asserts resume bit. The function shall be called 20ms after detecting port remote wakeup event.
